sourcesContent: import { MDBCardBody, MDBCardText, MDBCardTitle, MDBCol, MDBRow } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit'; import React from 'react'; const CardHeader = (props) => { return ( <> Mystery Word has: {props.randomWord.length} letters Your Number Of Tries : 4 ? "text-success h4-fs" : props.numberOfPlay > 2 ? "text-warning h4-fs" : "text-danger h4-fs" } > {props.numberOfPlay} token ); } export default CardHeader;
